description: Numbers n such that binary expansion does not end 011.
comments: Numbers less than 8 or not congruent to 3 (mod 8). - _M. F. Hasler_, Nov 02 2013
formula: For all n>4, a(n)=n+floor((n-12)\7); for n<12, a(n)=n-1. - _M. F. Hasler_, Nov 02 2013
prog: (PARI) is(n)=n%8!=3 || n==3 \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Mar 29 2013(PARI) A004775(n)=n+(n-5)\7-(n>4)  \\ - _M. F. Hasler_, Nov 02 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
